summary:
Welcome to my profile!

I am Jesse van der Plas, born in The Hague, work and organization psychologist and consultant at LTP. In my work I advise organizations to make better decisions with regard to the selection and development of their employees through insights from psychology and organizational sciences.

My passion in my work is to support my clients in such a way that they are able to perform their work as well as possible. I do this by advising on assessments, providing training and workshops and thinking about HR topics. My goal is to work together harmoniously, to keep on agreements and not to avoid any barriers. At LTP I am also the secretary of the works council. In 2019 I participated in the LTP Academy - an internal course focused on (personal) leadership.

In addition to my work, I enjoy singing in the Convivium chamber choir in Amsterdam, I do sports, I cycle through Amsterdam and I love meeting friends!

Do you want to know more? Feel free to call or email!
✆ +31 6 83 66 1305
✉ J.vanderPlas@ltp.nl

Department manager Collections & Access at Universiteitsbibliotheek Universiteit Utrecht

profile_positions.description:
Preventing you from hiring someone and gaining insight into someone's strengths and concerns at the start of the employment, why not? By adding an assessment to your selection procedure or development program, one reduces the chances of drop-out and increases the productivity and enjoyment of one's employees.

HOW WE HELP
LTP cooperates with various organizations from various sectors in the field of selection, development, career and (team) coaching. Our (online) assessments provide you with insight in personality, agility, intelligence, pitfalls and competencies of your (future) employees. With the data generated from these assessments, we can also help you with issues in the area of ​​strategic personnel planning and HR analytics.

WORK EXPERIENCE
I have had many different roles at LTP. I started as an intern in December 2014 as part of my master Work & Organizational Psychology and during that internship I developed an instrument to provide insights into risks related to integrity and derailments. Then I worked for two years at the Client Center of LTP. The Client Center of LTP is at the heart of LTP's online assessment services. With a team of service-oriented young professionals with knowledge of psychology and IT, users, customers, candidates and colleagues can contact them for questions, comments and advice about the best assessment solution. Since 2017 I have been working as a consultant in the LTP Online team in the role of psychologist, consultant and account manager for a number of organizations.

RESULTS
LTP is rewarded by its customers with a score of 95.4% customer satisfaction (CEDEO).

KNOW MORE?
Do you want more information? Download our whitepaper about changing organizations at science.ltp.nl or contact me!

+31 6 83661305
J.vanderPlas@ltp.nl
profile_positions.title: Consultant | Trainer | Talent Attraction & Development | Assessments | Gamification | Recruitment

profile_positions.description: Eigen bedrijf in advies en begeleiding op het gebied van aanbestedingen.
profile_positions.title: Eigenaar

profile_positions.description: At Lyceo I was working in several roles: As an interviewer, I led application days for new teachers and decided who should and should not be hired. As coordinator I led the exam training sessions and I was the general contact for all stakeholders: location managers, caterers, teachers, graduate students, parents and Lyceo. As a teacher I gave exam (GCSE) training in the languages French, German and English at all graduation levels. For the different parts I have been trained by Lyceo.
profile_positions.title: Selector, Coordinator, Teacher

profile_positions.description: The project student site aimed to provide one platform for all information for current students (n = 30,000) at Utrecht University. In addition, the goal was to put the structure of this information in order. As a product owner I was responsible for collecting all the wishes and needs of the target group (students) and of the editors (management). Subsequently, all these wishes were prioritized and translated into a functional design.
profile_positions.title: Product Owner Student Site

profile_positions.description: As a student member, I was responsible for transferring the student perspective to the educational policy of the Faculty of Social and Behavioural Sciences. I passed on the input of students from the various bodies of the participational council for the decisions of the Faculty Board (bottom-up) and I passed on the information from the various board and policy meetings to my constituents, so that students can be informed as well as possible of current affairs (top-down). In addition, I was the point of contact for study associations towards the faculty and I maintained contact with other student members in Utrecht and in the rest of the country. In this role I have set up projects to increase the visibility of student participation and to increase the involvement of students in their education. I also participated in a report on activating and teacher-extensive working methods in the context of the qualitatively good implementation of the education intensification.
profile_positions.title: Student member Faculty Board, faculty of Social and Behavioural Sciences

profile_positions.description: Assisting in the coordination tasks of the cursory education (bachelor and master) of the Department of Clinical and Health Psychology. In this position I was the PA to a course coordinator and also involved in contact with students, the set-up of the electronic learning environment, the administration of grades, the supervision and coordination of the exams and the informing of the teachers of the class. In addition, I took over the coordination during maternity leave or holiday and I was the general point of contact for students of the Clinical and Health Psychology course. At last, I wrote manuals for teachers in order to reduce their workload.
profile_positions.title: Student assistent, Department of Clinical and Health Psychology

profile_positions.description: At a front desk employee at Mondial Camping (250 places) I was responsible for checking in and out of camping guests, in mobile homes and camping places. Furthermore, I was general point of contact for the guests for any problems. In addition, the reception functioned as tourist information for the activities in the area. Guests came from many different countries. Language at the campsite was French, but I also spoke to the Dutch, German and English speaking guests. This function was full-time seasonal work for three summers.
profile_positions.title: Front Desk

profile_positions.description: Selling and preparing sandwiches, snacks, pies and bread. I was also manager and responsible for managing employees, opening and closing the store, checkout and inventory. As a manager, also a member of the management team.
profile_positions.title: Manager and sales representative
